data.actual_result: Updates in the member list removes the "selection" of the user. Moving the mouse around causes a flicker.
data.expected_result: The hover (grey background) stays there as long as the use list doesn't visually move.
data.short_description: User selection "flickers" at the bottom of the member list
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any sufficiently large server (largest = happens more) - Hover over any user. Move the mouse around to see a constant flicker effect
